product_name: Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight Zip-Neck Shirt - Girls'
long_description: Ideal for high-energy activities in a wide range of temperatures, the Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight Zip-Neck shirt for girls is highly breathable and fast drying. Patagonia has reinvented its Capilene(R) performance base layers, making them now from recycled and recyclable synthetic fiber. Gladiodor(R) natural odor control employs benign amino acids to help keep funky scents at bay; plus, it's nonpolluting, safe and durable. Yoke, raglan sleeves and single-piece shoulder panel merge out of the way for increased comfort under a backpack or ski bibs. Patagonia Capilene 3 Midweight Zip-Neck top features flatlock seams that are non-bulky and supple.
